alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Fulton; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 03 at 10:08PM EDT until April 08 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Indiana...Michigan... Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Fulton OH, Williams and Defiance Counties. Saint Joseph River Michigan at Three Rivers affecting Elkhart, Branch and St. Joseph MI Counties. .River rises will continue this week due to recent heavy rainfall and additional rainfall through Wednesday. Minor flooding is expected. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tiffin River at Stryker. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Portions of State Route 66 flood north of Archbold. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Monday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM EDT Monday was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
